Package othercontrollers

Class LoginInterFaceController

java.lang.Object
othercontrollers.LoginInterFaceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CloseablePage, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginInterFaceController extends Object implements CloseablePage, javafx.fxml.Initializable
This Class is a Login Page Controller for LoginHomePage.fxml ,it runs all the methods that functions the choices of the user
Author:
Shadi, Mahran

    getOrder(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    This method activates when the touch pad (on the machine) is clicked retrieves an order from a machine and checks if the order status is "Ready to Pickup" and the entered code matches the order code.
    void

    to initialize the length of input
    void
    login(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Method for clicking the Login Button ,switches stage to the next page(depends on the type of user) checks the type of user and if he exists in the data base and then switches the stage/scene in case the user doesn't exist in the data base or fields aren't filled an error message would be thrown
    void
    LoginViaSmartphone(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    Method for Login in via smart phone to the system ,this method will activate by clicking on the key icon (on the vending machine) this method also allows the the movement of the smart phone image and checks when the smart phone is on top of the key icon(like a sensor) in case the phone is in the right position the stage will be changed to the costumer page (user name: costumer2 , password: 123456)

    • login

      public void login(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Method for clicking the Login Button ,switches stage to the next page(depends on the type of user) checks the type of user and if he exists in the data base and then switches the stage/scene in case the user doesn't exist in the data base or fields aren't filled an error message would be thrown
      Parameters:
      event - event of the Create Sale Button clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException will be thrown if an error occurs

    • clsoe

      public void clsoe(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws Exception
      Method for closing the application, the window of the application would be closed
      Specified by:
      clsoe in interface CloseablePage
      Parameters:
      event - event of the X icon clicked
      Throws:
      Exception - Exception will be thrown if an error occurs

    • LoginViaSmartphone

      public void LoginViaSmartphone(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method for Login in via smart phone to the system ,this method will activate by clicking on the key icon (on the vending machine) this method also allows the the movement of the smart phone image and checks when the smart phone is on top of the key icon(like a sensor) in case the phone is in the right position the stage will be changed to the costumer page (user name: costumer2 , password: 123456)
      Parameters:
      event - event of clicking on the key icon

    • getOrder

      public void getOrder(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method activates when the touch pad (on the machine) is clicked retrieves an order from a machine and checks if the order status is "Ready to Pickup" and the entered code matches the order code. If it matches, it displays "thank you, have a nice day" otherwise "Wrong Code"
      Parameters:
      event - touch pad clicked

    • activateTab

      public void activateTab(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method to activate the ability of moving between text fields by clicking on TAB key (keyboard)
      Parameters:
      event - event on clicking on text field
